definition: (verse) having an extra syllable or syllables at the end of a metrically complete verse or in a metrical foot, (prosody) a line of poetry having an extra syllable or syllables at the end of the last metrical foot
details:
adjective
- (verse) having an extra syllable or syllables at the end of a metrically complete verse or in a metrical foot
noun
- (prosody) a line of poetry having an extra syllable or syllables at the end of the last metrical foot
